Class CashierCartController

java.lang.Object
com.group18.controller.cashier.sharedComponents.CashierCartController
public class CashierCartController extends Object
Controller class responsible for managing the cashier cart, including adding/removing items, displaying cart details, calculating subtotal, discounts, tax, and final total.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes the cashier cart controller by setting up necessary price DAO and updating the summary.

    • toggleCartDetails

      private void toggleCartDetails()
      Toggles the visibility of the cart details container with a smooth animation.

    • setMainController

      public void setMainController(CashierController controller)
      Sets the main controller for the cart controller.
      Parameters:
      controller - The main cashier controller.

    • getCartItemsContainer

      public javafx.scene.layout.VBox getCartItemsContainer()
      Gets the container that holds all cart items in the UI.
      Returns:
      The VBox containing all the cart items.

    • getCartItems

      public Map<String,javafx.scene.layout.HBox> getCartItems()
      Gets the map of cart items where the key is the item name and the value is the item container.
      Returns:
      A map containing the cart items and their corresponding UI containers.

    • setSessionContext

      public void setSessionContext(Movie movie, MovieSession session, LocalDate date)
      Sets the context for the movie session and selected date.
      Parameters:
      movie - The selected movie.
      session - The selected movie session.
      date - The selected date for the session.

    • addSeatsToCart

      public void addSeatsToCart(Set<String> selectedSeats)
      Adds selected seats to the cart.
      Parameters:
      selectedSeats - The set of selected seat IDs.

    • addCartItem

      public void addCartItem(String name, double price, int quantity, String type, double discountAmount)
      Adds an item to the cart with a specified discount amount.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the item.
      price - The price of the item.
      quantity - The quantity of the item.
      type - The type of the item (e.g., ticket, product).
      discountAmount - The discount amount for the item.

    • addCartItem

      public void addCartItem(String name, double price, int quantity, String type)
      Adds an item to the cart without a specified discount amount.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the item.
      price - The price of the item.
      quantity - The quantity of the item.
      type - The type of the item (e.g., ticket, product).

    • updateDiscount

      public void updateDiscount(double totalDiscount)
      Updates the discount amount and recalculates the subtotal and tax.
      Parameters:
      totalDiscount - The total discount applied.

    • recalculateSubtotalAndTax

      private void recalculateSubtotalAndTax()
      Recalculates the subtotal and tax based on the current cart items.

    • removeCartItem

      public void removeCartItem(String name)
      Removes an item from the cart.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the item to be removed.

    • createCartItemUI

      private javafx.scene.layout.HBox createCartItemUI(String name, double price, int quantity, double discountAmount)
      Creates the user interface for a cart item.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the item.
      price - The price of the item.
      quantity - The quantity of the item.
      discountAmount - The discount amount for the item.
      Returns:
      The HBox containing the UI components for the cart item.

    • updateSummary

      public void updateSummary()
      Updates the summary section of the cart, including item count, subtotal, discounts, tax, and total. This also ensures the button states are updated based on the current stage index.

    • refreshCart

      public void refreshCart()
      Refreshes the cart by removing all seat items and recalculating the subtotal, discounts, and tax for the remaining product items.

    • formatCurrency

      private String formatCurrency(double amount)
      Formats the given amount to a currency string using the Turkish locale.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount to format.
      Returns:
      A formatted string representing the amount in currency format.

    • clearCart

      public void clearCart()
      Clears all items from the cart, resets the subtotal, discounts, and tax to zero, and updates the summary. Also updates the button states based on the current stage index.

    • getSubtotal

      public double getSubtotal()
      Gets the current subtotal of the cart.
      Returns:
      The subtotal of all items in the cart.

    • getTax

      public double getTax()
      Gets the current tax of the cart.
      Returns:
      The total tax applied to the items in the cart.

    • getTotal

      public double getTotal()
      Gets the total amount for the cart, which is the subtotal minus any discounts plus the tax.
      Returns:
      The total cost for the cart, after considering discounts and tax.
